TopicTitle: Who here watches Linus Tech Tips?

Articles.Content: Fairly simple - who here watches Linus Tech Tips. Either on Youtube or Vessel, it doesn't matter where, it just matters if you watch it or not ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I watch it a fair bit, but they havn't really been doing many videos the past 2 weeks... Anyway, vote on ze' poll if you please! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Yes, i love computer hardware reviews and the random stuff he does.

Voted turnip because I am sheeple...

I watch his videos from time to time but find they're often not quite technical enough for my fancy. I can see where they would be great for someone with minimal background wanting a crash course in computer stuff.
His videos are of of good quality and his reviews are actual reviews. It's not a bad channel.

Not bad, but a bit too Canadian at times for my tastes.

Silly Canadians. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Not bad, but a bit too Canadian at times for my tastes.
> Silly Canadians. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I agree, and on some subjects his voice can be like razor blades scraping on a windowpane. Sometimes the cuts are too fast for my tastes, I prefer it when a video/filmmaker lets their shots express fully before cutting to another shot.
"Too Canadian"? Is that a thing now?

> 
> "Too Canadian"? Is that a thing now?

I'd like to apologise on Sega's behalf. The phrase, sentence really, that he should have used was "Possessing an excessive amount of Canadian culture as to obfuscate given information".

> 
> "Too Canadian"? Is that a thing now?

was thinking it was not enough xDr anyway fixed somehow ; )

No apology necessary, I wasn't offended or anything. I just hadn't heard something described as "too Canadian" before. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
